name: product_showcase_3
description: Enhanced product advertisement template for the products

fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality product image with a clean, modern aesthetic. Specify portrait orientation with the product centered and professionally lit, showcasing key features and design elements. Include details about background (transparent or solid), lighting setup, composition, and any specific angles or details that highlight the product's best features.
fieldPrompt.product_name: Enter a clear, descriptive product name (2-3 words, max 15 characters) that immediately communicates what the product is. Examples: Noise-Canceling Headphones, Stainless Steel Water Bottle, Wireless Charger. Use specific, benefit-focused terminology.
fieldPrompt.product_description: Write a compelling product description (6-7 words, max 45 characters) that highlights the most important features or benefits. Examples: Premium sound with 30-hour battery life, Durable design with leak-proof technology. Focus on what makes the product unique and valuable.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear, action-oriented call-to-action (2-3 words) that encourages immediate response. Examples: Shop Now, Buy Today, Learn More, Get Yours, Order Here. Make it compelling and easy to understand.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your business website URL (e.g., yourbusiness.com, shop.yourbrand.com). Omit http:// or www for a cleaner, more professional appearance.
fieldPrompt.product_price: Enter the product price with currency symbol (e.g., ₹2,499, $99.99, €89.50). Include any discounts, special offers, or promotional pricing if applicable. Make it clear and easy to read.
